features: Soft and Comfortable: CARUILI toddler bedding set is made with 100% microfiber polyester, ensuring a super breathable and durable bedding set that is soft and comfortable for your little one's bedtime.

Vibrant and Fun Design: Featuring a delightful rainbow, sun, and hearts, our toddler comforter set adds a playful and vibrant touch to any child's room, making it perfect for girls who love all things colorful!

Complete 4-Piece Set: This toddler bed set includes a reversible comforter, pillowcase, flat top sheet, and fitted bottom sheet, providing all the pieces you need to create a cozy and coordinated bed for your toddler.
Easy to Clean and Care for: With machine washable instructions, our kids bedding is easy to clean and maintain, ensuring that your child's bed always stays fresh and hygienic.

Perfect Gift for Girls: With its soft and feminine color palette, adorable rainbow theme, and ability to coordinate with other items in the Rainbow Dreams range, this toddler girl bedding set makes a great birthday or holiday gift for any toddler girl.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CARUILI Toddler Bedding Set - A Comfortable and Vibrant Addition to Your Child's Room! Create a cozy and stylish sleeping space for your toddler with the Toddler Girl Bedding Set. This 4-piece set combines comfort, durability, and a touch of whimsy to make bedtime a joyful experience for your little one.

Made of 100% microfiber polyester, this bedding set is super breathable and built to last. The soft and comfortable material ensures a restful night's sleep for your child, allowing them to wake up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I searched and searched for a toddler bed set that wasn’t too cartoonish but also wasn’t too boring/adult ish for a little one. I kept coming back to this and thought, let’s give it a try. My only concern before receiving it was, what would the material/fabric of the comforter feel like.The sheets are exactly what you would expect and feel basically as soft as most of the general baby/toddler bedding out there. The comforter was a lot more comfy than I thought it would be! It’s not super thick but it’s most definitely not thin, it’s pretty perfect for a toddler to be honest! It’s pretty plush which is nice and looks adorable in our little girls room.OH I should add, the little rainbow pillow, despite matching perfectly, was not purchased through this company/seller. I found it at Hobby Lobby for $20 and it just so happened to fit exactly right! :)I did wash the sheets, pillow case and comforter the day it arrived and everything was totally fine! I ran the washer on the delicate cycle just to be on the safe side and dried everything on low heat. Came out perfect! I definitely recommend this bedding set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price, good material, good deal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy rainbow bedding set
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this 4 Piece Toddler Bedding Set for Girls for my daughter. She really loved the rainbow theme. It is super comfy as well. It is fitting the bed we have right now except the pillow which is a little larger as she uses a small pillow.The fabric is comfy too as the material is mixed polyester and cotton. The four-piece set includes a comforter, pillow cover, fitted sheet, and flat sheet. No special washing instructions which means it can be washed in machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my granddaughters new toddler bed and it is perfect. everything fits great and is super soft and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pictures on this comforter is very cheaply printed on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute toddler bedding
reviews.reviewText: This bed set is really cute. The print looks just like the picture and is great for a little girl’s room. It fits my toddler’s bed well. I agree with other reviews that this is lightweight. It’s winter here in Colorado so she definitely needs some warm pjs and a blanket in addition to this. I was a little disappointed it’s not more soft. Also, the instructions say machine wash but hang dry. That doesn’t seem the best for life with little kids. I did put it in the dryer and it seems to be holding up fine… but I’m not sure if it will last as long as I hoped. Overall I’m not unhappy with it, I just don’t like it as much as I thought I would. For the price, I was expecting something a little better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and soft like cotton candy!
reviews.reviewText: EVERY KID COLORS ON! This duvet set makes the room brighter! Whatever mood you have, this will bring out the positive energy of yours. Its comfy and SUPER SOFT like cotton candy! The stitches are high quality strong and this set will be part of your house for a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size! Very pretty.
reviews.reviewText: This was kind of an impulse buy, I saw this and the price was right and I'd been thinking about getting something like this for my dog's bed. She prefers to sleep on our bed so I wondered if maybe she just wanted the blanket/bedding. With this, her dog mattress is protected, it's super easy to clean and I can wash it with her towels and not have to worry about anything getting caught on the zippers.Glad I got this, also because it looks so much better than the typical pet stuff.
